name: Demon Roots (itch)
description:
A slender man inspired Horror Walking Simulator where you explore the sentient forest of evil trees slowly taking over all organic life on earth !

You are tasked to Investigate the site of the mysterious trees that are changing the oxygen levels of the earth. 

Find and retrieve all of the government property left behind and report on why the science team stationed on the site have disappeared.

Your boss will not allow you to evacuate before you have all the Items with you and STAY AWAY FROM THE TREES !
